verses.text: In the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \add month\add*, in the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* and \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* \add day\add* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, came the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w Haggai|strong="H2292"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \f + \fr 2.1 \ft by: Heb. by the hand of\f*

\w Speak|strong="H0559"\w* now to \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shealtiel|strong="H7597"\w*, \w governor|strong="H6346"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and to \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Josedech|strong="H3087"\w*, the \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and to the \w residue|strong="H7611"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Who \add is\add* \w left|strong="H7604"\w* among you that \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* this \w house|strong="H1004"\w* in her \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*? and how do ye \w see|strong="H7200"\w* it now? \add is it\add* not in your \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* in \w comparison|strong="H3644"\w* of it as nothing?

Yet now be \w strong|strong="H2388"\w*, O \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and be \w strong|strong="H2388"\w*, O \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Josedech|strong="H3087"\w*, the \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*; and be \w strong|strong="H2388"\w*, all ye \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w work|strong="H6213"\w*: for I \add am\add* with you, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*:

\add According to\add* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* that I \w covenanted|strong="H3772"\w* with you when ye \w came|strong="H3318"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, so my \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w remaineth|strong="H5975"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* you: \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* ye not.

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; Yet \w once|strong="H0259"\w*, it \add is\add* a little \w while|strong="H4592"\w*, and I will \w shake|strong="H7493"\w* the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, and the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and the \w dry|strong="H2724"\w* \add land;\add*

And I will \w shake|strong="H7493"\w* all \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, and the \w desire|strong="H2532"\w* of all \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w*: and I will \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* this \w house|strong="H1004"\w* with \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

The \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \add is\add* mine, and the \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \add is\add* mine, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

The \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of this \w latter|strong="H0314"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* shall be greater \w than|strong="H1419"\w* of the \w former|strong="H7223"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*: and in this \w place|strong="H4725"\w* will I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

¶ In the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* and \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* \add day\add* of the \w ninth|strong="H8671"\w* \add month\add*, in the \w second|strong="H8147"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Darius|strong="H1867"\w*, came the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w Haggai|strong="H2292"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; \w Ask|strong="H7592"\w* now the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \add concerning\add* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

If \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* in the \w skirt|strong="H3671"\w* of his \w garment|strong="H0899"\w*, and with his \w skirt|strong="H3671"\w* do \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, or \w pottage|strong="H5138"\w*, or \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, or \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, or any \w meat|strong="H3978"\w*, shall it be \w holy|strong="H6942"\w*? And the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, No.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Haggai|strong="H2292"\w*, If \add one that is\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* by a dead \w body|strong="H5315"\w* \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* any of these, shall it be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*? And the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, It shall be \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*.

Then \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w Haggai|strong="H2292"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, So \add is\add* this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and so \add is\add* this \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and so \add is\add* every \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*; and that which they \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* there \add is\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*.

And now, I pray you, \w consider|strong="H7760"\w* from this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, from \w before|strong="H2962"\w* a \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* was \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* upon a \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* in the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:

Since those \add days\add* were, when \add one\add* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to an \w heap|strong="H6194"\w* of \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \add measures\add*, there were \add but\add* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w*: when \add one\add* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w pressfat|strong="H3342"\w* for to draw \w out|strong="H2834"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \add vessels\add* out of the \w press|strong="H6333"\w*, there were \add but\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w*.

I \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* you with \w blasting|strong="H7711"\w* and with \w mildew|strong="H3420"\w* and with \w hail|strong="H1259"\w* in all the \w labours|strong="H4639"\w* of your \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*; yet ye \add turned\add* not to me, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

\w Consider|strong="H7760"\w* now from this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, from the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* and \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w ninth|strong="H8671"\w* \add month, even\add* from the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that the \w foundation|strong="H3245"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* was laid, \w consider|strong="H7760"\w* \add it\add*.

Is the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* yet in the \w barn|strong="H4035"\w*? yea, as yet the \w vine|strong="H1612"\w*, and the fig \w tree|strong="H8384"\w*, and the \w pomegranate|strong="H7416"\w*, and the \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, hath not brought \w forth|strong="H5375"\w*: from this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* will I \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \add you\add*.

¶ And \w again|strong="H8145"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto \w Haggai|strong="H2292"\w* in the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* and \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* \add day\add* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w*, \w governor|strong="H6346"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, I will \w shake|strong="H7493"\w* the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* and the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*;

And I will \w overthrow|strong="H2015"\w* the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w*, and I will \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* the \w strength|strong="H2392"\w* of the \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*; and I will \w overthrow|strong="H2015"\w* the \w chariots|strong="H4818"\w*, and those that \w ride|strong="H7392"\w* in them; and the \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* and their \w riders|strong="H7392"\w* shall come \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* of his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*.

In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, will I \w take|strong="H3947"\w* thee, O \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w*, my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shealtiel|strong="H7597"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and will \w make|strong="H7760"\w* thee as a \w signet|strong="H2368"\w*: for I have \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* thee, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.
